Our Chicken

Our chicken is the only product that we are unable to produce on the farm currently, however we are sourcing the best products we can from British Farm Assured Chicken Farms as locally as possible. In turn we are also sourcing these at the best price we can possibly get to be able to pass this on.

Why Choose Us?

  • Premium quality products
  • Free local delivery
  • Five star hygiene rated
  • Value for money
